subject: JUnit - HTTPUnit - (js.jar) not found
msgSnippet: I am trying to learn how to bring JUnit and HTTPUnit together. I am running in Eclipse and get the following message: Rhino classes (js.jar) not found -
messageBody:
I am trying to learn how to bring JUnit and HTTPUnit together.

I am running in Eclipse and get the following message:
Rhino classes (js.jar) not found - Javascript disabled

My code:
import junit.framework.TestCase;
import com.meterware.httpunit.*;

// I copied a web page http://httpunit.sourceforge.net/doc/cookbook.html
// I am trying to run some of their tests against the webpage
// I must be be missing some very fundamental JAVA coding

public class testWebPage extends TestCase {

public void testCookBookPage() {
// junit.textui.TestRunner.run(testWebPage.class);

WebConversation wc = new WebConversation();
WebResponse resp = wc.getResponse(
"file:///D:/Download/JAVADevelopment/HTTPUnit/cookbook.html" );
WebLink link = resp.getLinkWith( "response" );
// find the link
link.click();
// follow it
WebResponse jdoc = wc.getCurrentPage();
// retrieve the referenced page

WebTable table = resp.getTables()[0];
assertEquals( "rows", 4, table.getRowCount() );
assertEquals( "columns", 3, table.getColumnCount() );
assertEquals( "links", 1, table.getTableCell( 0, 2 ).getLinks().length
);

}
}

My environment variables:
ANT_HOME=D:\JAVADevEnv\Tools\apache-ant-1.6.1
CATALINA_HOME=D:\JAVADevEnv\Tools\jakarta-tomcat-5.0.25
CLASSPATH=%JAVA_HOME%\bin;D:\JAVADevEnv\Tools\apache-ant-1.6.1\bin;D:\JAVADevEnv\Tools\jakarta-tomcat-5.0.25\bin;%MYSQL_HOME%\bin;%JUNIT_HOME%\junit.jar;%HTTPUNIT_HOME%\httpunit-1.6\lib\httpunit.jar;%HTTPUNIT_HOME%\httpunit-1.6\jars\js.jar
CVSROOT=D:\JAVADevEnv\CVS
HOME=D:\JAVADevEnv\Source
HTTPUNIT_HOME=D:\JAVADevEnv\Tools\HTTPUnit\httpunit-1.6
JAVA_HOME=D:\JAVADevEnv\SDKs\j2sdk-1_4_2_04-windows-i586
JUNIT_HOME=D:\JAVADevEnv\Tools\JUnit\junit3.8.1
MYSQL_HOME=D:\JAVADevEnv\Tools\mysql
SDKS_HOME=D:\JAVADevEnv\SDKs
TOOLS_HOME=D:\JAVADevEnv\Tools

Any guidance will be appreciated.

Clark Anderson
